alert.note: Alert for San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 10:09PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Alameda, central San Mateo and northwestern Santa Clara Counties through 1045 PM PST... At 1009 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Atherton to near Half Moon Bay. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fremont, Sunnyvale, Redwood City, Mountain View, Palo Alto, Menlo Park, San Carlos, East Palo Alto, Half Moon Bay, Los Altos Hills, Atherton, Woodside, North Fair Oaks, Stanford, Portola Valley, West Menlo Park and Emerald Lake Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains
